text: phir jab usane baalika janee, to (santaap se) kahaah mere paalanahaar! mujhe to baalika ho gayee, haalaanki jo usane jana, usaka allaah ko bhalee-bhaanti gyaan tha -aur nar naaree ke samaan nahin hota- aur mainne usaka naam maryam rakha hai aur main use tatha usakee santaan ko dhikkaare hue shaitaan se teree sharan mein detee hoon
